title: Govt appoints ex-finance secretary Ajay Bhushan Pandey as NFRA chief - Times of India
content: Govt appoints ex-finance secretary Ajay Bhushan Pandey as NFRA chief  Times of India
description: India Business News: The government has appointed former finance secretary Ajay Bhushan Pandey as chairman of the National Financial Reporting Authority (NFRA) for a perio
